descriptionHtml:
[img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20130309202113/darkcloud/images/0/0b/Big_Bang.png[/img]

Yet another Dark Cloud sword :)

This is probably my best sword yet, so please show your support by giving feedback!

This sword can be located in the Solitude Catacombs.

It\'s a work in progress, so I\'m hoping I can do some work to fix up some of the seams in the texture (mismatching colors, awkward pixelation, et cetera, so please be patient with the updates.
author: halex1316
